H0.text: Known as Action Man in the UK, what 1964 Hasbro toy is responsible for the coining the phrase action figure. Major Matt Mason

H1.text: Known as Action Man in the UK, what 1964 Hasbro toy is responsible for the coining the phrase action figure. Captain Action

H2.text: Known as Action Man in the UK, what 1964 Hasbro toy is responsible for the coining the phrase action figure. Johnny West

H3.text: Known as Action Man in the UK, what 1964 Hasbro toy is responsible for the coining the phrase action figure. Gijoe

A4.text: Major Matt Mason was an action figure created by Mattel. He was an astronaut who lived and worked on the Moon.

A5.text: When introduced in 1966, the figures were initially based on design information found in Life Magazine, Air Force Magazine, Jane's, and other aviation- and space-interest periodicals.

A6.text: The term 'action figure' was coined by Hasbro in 1964, to market their G.I. Joe figure to boys
